Verses: 1 dhevanudaiya Manushanaagiya Mose Thaan Maranamataiyumunne Isravel Puththirarai Aaseervadhiththa Aaseervaadhamaavadhu:

2 karththar Seenaayilirundhu Ezhundharuli, Seyeerilirundhu Avargalukku Udhayamaanaar; Paaraan Malaiyilirundhu Piragaasiththu, Padhinaayirangalaana Parisuththavaangalode Pirasannamaanaar; Avargalukkaaga Akkinimayamaana Piramaanam Avarudaiya Valadhukaraththilirundhu Purappattadhu.

3 meyyaagave Avar Janangalaich Sinegikkiraar; Avarudaiya Parisuththavaangalellaarum Ummudaiya Kaiyil Irukkiraargal; Avargal Ummudaiya Paadhaththilvizhundhu, Ummudaiya Vaarththaigalinaal Podhanaiyadaivaargal.
4 mose Namakku Oru Niyaayappiramaanaththaik Karpiththaan; Adhu Yaakkobin Sabaikkuch Sudhandharamaayitru.
5 janangalin Thalaivarum Isravelin Koththirangalum Koottangoodinapodhu Avar Yeshooranukku Raajaavaayirundhaar.
6 rooban Saavaamal Pizhaippaanaaga; Avan Janam Konjamaayiraadhu Endraan.

7 avan Yoodhaavaik Kuriththu: Karththaave, Yoodhaavin Saththaththaik Kettu, Avan Than Janaththode Thirumbachcherappannum; Avan Kai Palakkakkadavadhu; Avanudaiya Saththurukkalukku Avanai Neengalaakki Viduvikkira Sagaayaraayiruppeeraaga Endraan.
8 leviyaikkuriththu: Nee Maasaavile Pareetchaipaarththu, Meripaavin Thanneeridaththil Vaakkuvaadhampannina Un Parisuththa Purushan Vasamaai Unnudaiya Thummeem Ooreem Enbavaigal Iruppadhaaga.

9 than Thagappanukkum Than Thaaikkum: Naan Ungalaip Paaren Endru Solli, Than Sagodhararai Angigariyaamal, Than Pillaigalaiyum Ariyaamalirukkiravan Vasamaai Avaigal Iruppadhaaga; Avargal Ummudaiya Vaarththaigalaik Kaikkondu, Ummudaiya Udanbadikkaiyaik Kaakkiravargal.

10 avargal Yaakkobukku Ummudaiya Niyaayangalaiyum, Isravelukku Ummudaiya Piramaanaththaiyum Podhiththu, Umadhu Sannidhaanaththile Thoobavarkkaththaiyum, Umadhu Balibeedaththinmel Sarvaangadhaganabaligalaiyum Iduvaargal.

11 karththaave, Avan Sambaththai Aaseervadhiththu, Avan Kaikkiriyaiyinmel Piriyamaayirum; Avanaip Pagaiththu Avanukku Virodhamaai Ezhumbugiravargal Thirumba Ezhundhiraadhabadi Avargaludaiya Iduppugalai Norukkividum Endraan.
12 benyameenaikkuriththu: Karththarukkup Piriyamaanavan, Avarode Sugamaaith Thangiyiruppaan; Avanai Ennaalum Avar Kaappaatri, Avan Ellaikkulle Vaasamaayiruppaar Endraan.
13 yoseppaikkuriththu: Karththaraal Avanudaiya Dhesam Aaseervadhikkappaduvadhaaga; Adhu Vaanaththin Selvaththinaalum, Paniyinaalum, Aazhaththilulla Neerootrugalinaalum,
14 sooriyan Pakkuvappaduththum Arumaiyaana Kanigalinaalum, Sandhiran Pakkuvappaduththum Arumaiyaana Palangalinaalum,
15 aadhiparvadhangalil Undaagum Thiraviyangalinaalum Niththiya Malaigalil Pirakkum Arumporulgalinaalum,

16 naadum Adhin Niraivum Kodukkum Arumaiyaana Thaaniyangalinaalum Aaseervadhikkappaduvadhaaga. Mudchediyil Ezhundharulinavarin Thayai Yoseppudaiya Sirasinmelum, Than Sagodhararil Viseshiththavanudaiya Uchchandhalaiyinmelum Varuvadhaaga.

17 avan Alangaaram Avan Thalaiyeetruk Kaalaiyinudaiya Alangaaraththaippolavum, Avan Kombugal Kaandaamirugaththin Kombugalaippolavum Irukkum; Avaigalaale Janangalai Egamaai Dhesaththin Kadaiyaandharangalmattum Muttith Thuraththuvaan; Avaigal Eppiraayeemin Padhinaayirangalum Manaaseyin Aayirangalumaanavaigal Endraan.
18 sepulonaikkuriththu: Sepulone, Nee Veliye Purappattuppogaiyilum, Isakkaare, Nee Un Koodaarangalil Thangugaiyilum Sandhoshamaayiru.
19 janangalai Avargal Malaiyinmel Varavazhaiththu, Ange Needhiyin Baligalai Iduvaargal; Kadalgalilulla Sambooranaththaiyum Manalukkulle Maraindhirukkum Porulgalaiyum Anubavippaargal Endraan.
20 kaaththaikkuriththu: Kaaththukku Visthaaramaana Idaththaik Kodukkiravar Sthoththirikkappattavar; Avan Singaththaippol Thangiyirundhu, Puyaththaiyum Uchchandhalaiyaiyum Peerippoduvaan.

21 avan Thanakkaaga Mudhal Idaththaippaarththukkondaan; Ange Thanakku Niyaayappiramaanikan Koduththa Pangupaththiramaayirukkiradhu; Aanaalum Avan Janaththina Munnaniyaai Vandhu, Matra Israveludane Karththarin Needhiyaiyum Avarudaiya Niyaayangalaiyum Nadappippaan Endraan.
22 thaanaikkuriththu: Thaan Oru Baalasingam, Avan Paasaanilirundhu Paaivaan Endraan.

23 napdhaliyaikkuriththu: Napdhali Karththarudaiya Dhayavinaale Thirupthiyadaindhu, Avarudaiya Aaseervaadhaththinaale Niraindhiruppaan. Nee Metrisaiyaiyum Thendhisaiyaiyum Sudhandhariththukkol Endraan.
24 aaseraikkuriththu: Aaser Puththirapaakkiyamudaiyavanaai, Than Sagodhararukkup Piriyamaayirundhu, Than Kaalai Enneyile Thoippaan.
25 irumbum Vengalamum Un Paadharatchaiyin Keezhirukkum; Un Naatkalukkuththakkadhaai Un Belanum Irukkum Endraan.
26 yeshooranudaiya Dhevanaippol Oruvarum Illai; Avar Unakkuch Sagaayamaai Vaanangalinmelum Thamadhu Maatchimaiyodu Aagaaya Mandalangalinmelum Erivarugiraar.
27 anaadhi Dhevane Unakku Adaikkalam; Avarudaiya Niththiya Puyangal Unakku Aadhaaram; Avar Unakku Munnindru Saththurukkalaith Thuraththi, Avargalai Azhiththuppodu Endru Kattalaiyiduvaar.
28 isravel Sugamaaith Thaniththu Vaasampannuvaan; Yaakkobin Ootraanadhu Dhaaniyamum Thiraatcharasamumulla Dhesaththile Irukkum; Avarudaiya Vaanamum Paniyaip Peyyum.

29 isravele, Nee Paakkiyavaan; Karththaraal Ratchikkappatta Janame, Unakku Oppaanavan Yaar? Unakkuch Sagaayanjeyyum Ketakamum Unakku Magimaiporundhiya Pattayamum Avare; Un Saththurukkal Unakku Ichchagam Pesi Adanguvaargal; Avargal Medugalai Midhippaai, Endru Sonnaan.
